nodes.h:
“Today you are you, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is you-er than you.” —
Dr. Seuss
nodes.q: Today you are you, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is you-er than you.

nodes.h:
“In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.” —
Thomas Jefferson
nodes.q: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.

nodes.h:
“Opportunities don't often come along. So, when they do, you have to grab them.” —
Audrey Hepburn
nodes.q: Opportunities don't often come along. So, when they do, you have to grab them.

nodes.h:
“Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.” —
Henry David Thoreau
nodes.q: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.

nodes.h:
“The health of nations is more important than the wealth of nations.” —
Will Rogers
nodes.q: The health of nations is more important than the wealth of nations.

nodes.h:
“Making money isn't hard in itself... What's hard is to earn it doing something worth devoting one's life to.” —
Carlos Ruiz Zafon
nodes.q: Making money isn't hard in itself... What's hard is to earn it doing something worth devoting one's life to.

nodes.h:
“Never argue with ignorance. It only leads to frustration.” —
Unknown
nodes.q: Never argue with ignorance. It only leads to frustration.

nodes.h:
“Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.” —
Conrad Hilton
nodes.q: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.

nodes.h:
“Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.” —
Rumi
nodes.q: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.

nodes.h:
“There is an essence of when you are fearless, you become more creative.” —
Gurbaksh Chahal
nodes.q: There is an essence of when you are fearless, you become more creative.

nodes.h:
“Do not follow the ideas of others, but learn to listen to the voice within yourself.” —
Dogen
nodes.q: Do not follow the ideas of others, but learn to listen to the voice within yourself.

nodes.h:
“You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.” —
William Faulkner
nodes.q: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.

nodes.h:
“Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.” —
Helen Keller
nodes.q: Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.

nodes.h:
“It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.” —
Mother Teresa
nodes.q: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.

nodes.h:
“It is the power of thought that gives man power over nature.” —
Hans Christian Andersen
nodes.q: It is the power of thought that gives man power over nature.

nodes.h:
“A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.” —
James Allen
nodes.q: A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.

nodes.h:
“One of the first signs of the beginning of understanding is the wish to die. ” —
Franz Kafka
nodes.q: One of the first signs of the beginning of understanding is the wish to die.

nodes.h:
“Many roads lead to the path, but basically there are only two: reason and practice. ” —
Bodhidharma
nodes.q: Many roads lead to the path, but basically there are only two: reason and practice.

nodes.h:
“The pursuit of mastery bears gifts. ” —
Gary Keller
nodes.q: The pursuit of mastery bears gifts.

nodes.h:
“We learn to walk by falling down. If we never fell down, we would never walk.” —
Robert Kiyosaki
nodes.q: We learn to walk by falling down. If we never fell down, we would never walk.

nodes.h:
“Peace is letting it be. Letting life flow, letting emotions flow through you.” —
Kamal Ravikant
nodes.q: Peace is letting it be. Letting life flow, letting emotions flow through you.

nodes.h:
“If life is a video game, the graphics are great, but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long.” —
Elon Musk
nodes.q: If life is a video game, the graphics are great, but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long.

nodes.h:
“When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself” —
Wayne Dyer
nodes.q: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself

nodes.h:
“You can start changing our world for the better daily, no matter how small the action.” —
Nelson Mandela
nodes.q: You can start changing our world for the better daily, no matter how small the action.

nodes.h:
“In nature there is no alienation. Everything belongs.” —
Ming-Dao Deng
nodes.q: In nature there is no alienation. Everything belongs.

nodes.h:
“The more often a stupidity is repeated, the more it gets the appearance of wisdom.” —
Voltaire
nodes.q: The more often a stupidity is repeated, the more it gets the appearance of wisdom.

nodes.h:
“Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.” —
Steve Maraboli
nodes.q: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.

nodes.h:
“Learn from the rejection and turn it into an opportunity!” —
Mary Engelbreit
nodes.q: Learn from the rejection and turn it into an opportunity!

nodes.h:
“Sometimes you have to shut your eyes, so you can see the real beauty.” —
Kilian Jornet
nodes.q: Sometimes you have to shut your eyes, so you can see the real beauty.

nodes.h:
“Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs. ” —
Henry Ford
nodes.q: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.

nodes.h:
“Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best. ” —
St. Jerome
nodes.q: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.

nodes.h:
“Do not allow your inner doubts to keep you from achieving what you can do.” —
Lolly Daskal
nodes.q: Do not allow your inner doubts to keep you from achieving what you can do.

nodes.h:
“It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses, we must plant more roses.” —
George Eliot
nodes.q: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses, we must plant more roses.

nodes.h:
“Many a man has failed because he had his wishbone where his backbone should have been.” —
Ronald Reagan
nodes.q: Many a man has failed because he had his wishbone where his backbone should have been.

nodes.h:
“Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.” —
Stephen Hawking
nodes.q: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.

nodes.h:
“Life can be the scariest and most beautiful thing simultaneously.” —
Maxime Lagace
nodes.q: Life can be the scariest and most beautiful thing simultaneously.

nodes.h:
“Confidence is not a guarantee of success, but a pattern of thinking that will improve your likelihood of success, a tenacious search for ways to make things work.” —
John Eliot
nodes.q: Confidence is not a guarantee of success, but a pattern of thinking that will improve your likelihood of success, a tenacious search for ways to make things work.

nodes.h:
“Friendship takes time and energy if it's going to work.” —
Betty White
nodes.q: Friendship takes time and energy if it's going to work.

nodes.h:
“Heart is what separates the good from the great.” —
Michael Jordan
nodes.q: Heart is what separates the good from the great.

nodes.h:
“Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.” —
John Wooden
nodes.q: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.

nodes.h:
“Any fool can turn a blind eye but who knows what the ostrich sees in the sand.” —
Samuel Beckett
nodes.q: Any fool can turn a blind eye but who knows what the ostrich sees in the sand.

nodes.h:
“A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.” —
Richard Bach
nodes.q: A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.

nodes.h:
“Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.” —
Stephen King
nodes.q: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.

nodes.h:
“Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.” —
Thomas Edison
nodes.q: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

nodes.h:
“Live your life and forget your age.” —
Norman Vincent Peale
nodes.q: Live your life and forget your age.

nodes.h:
“Sad thing is, you can still love someone and be wrong for them.” —
Elvis Presley
nodes.q: Sad thing is, you can still love someone and be wrong for them.

nodes.h:
“Progress lies not in enhancing what is, but in advancing toward what will be.” —
Kahlil Gibran
nodes.q: Progress lies not in enhancing what is, but in advancing toward what will be.

nodes.h:
“One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night. ” —
Margaret Mead
nodes.q: One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night.

nodes.h:
“Leadership starts at the top.” —
Morgan Wootten
nodes.q: Leadership starts at the top.

nodes.h:
“We must not cease from exploration. And the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we began and to know the place for the first time.” —
T.S. Eliot
nodes.q: We must not cease from exploration. And the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we began and to know the place for the first time.

nodes.h:
“Most people achieved their greatest success one step beyond what looked like their greatest failure.” —
Brian Tracy
nodes.q: Most people achieved their greatest success one step beyond what looked like their greatest failure.

nodes.h:
“The future is not a gift. It is an achievement.” —
Robert F. Kennedy
nodes.q: The future is not a gift. It is an achievement.

nodes.h:
“You are the only problem you will ever have and you are the only solution.” —
Bob Proctor
nodes.q: You are the only problem you will ever have and you are the only solution.

nodes.h:
“Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.” —
Mark Twain
nodes.q: Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.

nodes.h:
“Others have seen what is and asked why. I have seen what could be and asked why not” —
Pablo Picasso
nodes.q: Others have seen what is and asked why. I have seen what could be and asked why not

nodes.h:
“We can choose to look at whatever we want. We can look at what's wrong in our life or we can look at what's right.” —
Sonia Ricotti
nodes.q: We can choose to look at whatever we want.  We can look at what's wrong in our life or we can look at what's right.

nodes.h:
“The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.” —
Ayn Rand
nodes.q: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.

nodes.h:
“Sometimes you have to lose all you have to find out who you truly are.” —
Roy T. Bennett
nodes.q: Sometimes you have to lose all you have to find out who you truly are.

nodes.h:
“Believe you can and you're halfway there.” —
Theodore Roosevelt
nodes.q: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

nodes.h:
“No tree, it is said, can grow to heaven unless its roots reach down to hell.” —
Carl Jung
nodes.q: No tree, it is said, can grow to heaven unless its roots reach down to hell.

nodes.h:
“I have never in my life learned anything from any man who agreed with me.” —
Dudley Field Malone
nodes.q: I have never in my life learned anything from any man who agreed with me.

nodes.h:
“Formal education will make you a living, self-education will make you a fortune.” —
Jim Rohn
nodes.q: Formal education will make you a living, self-education will make you a fortune.

nodes.h:
“Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.” —
Andrew Carnegie
nodes.q: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.

nodes.h:
“Act the way you want to be and soon you'll be the way you act.” —
Les Brown
nodes.q: Act the way you want to be and soon you'll be the way you act.

nodes.h:
“Cherish forever what makes you unique, cuz you're really a yawn if it goes.” —
Bette Midler
nodes.q: Cherish forever what makes you unique, cuz you're really a yawn if it goes.

nodes.h:
“Listening well is as powerful as talking well, and is also as essential to true conversation.” —
Chinese Proverb
nodes.q: Listening well is as powerful as talking well, and is also as essential to true conversation.

nodes.h:
“Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.” —
Robert Frost
nodes.q: Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.

nodes.h:
“Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.” —
Meister Eckhart
nodes.q: Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.

nodes.h:
“It's not the love you make. It's the love you give. ” —
Nikola Tesla
nodes.q: It's not the love you make. It's the love you give.

nodes.h:
“A Quitter never wins - and - a Winner never quits.” —
Napoleon Hill
nodes.q: A Quitter never wins - and - a Winner never quits.

nodes.h:
“If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.” —
Dalai Lama
nodes.q: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.

nodes.h:
“Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It's all funny.” —
Joan Rivers
nodes.q: Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It's all funny.

nodes.h:
“Associate yourself with men of good quality, if you esteem your own reputation; for 'tis better to be alone than in bad company. ” —
George Washington
nodes.q: Associate yourself with men of good quality, if you esteem your own reputation; for 'tis better to be alone than in bad company.

nodes.h:
“Family not only needs to consist of merely those whom we share blood, but also of those whom we'd give blood.” —
Charles Dickens
nodes.q: Family not only needs to consist of merely those whom we share blood, but also of those whom we'd give blood.

nodes.h:
“Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.” —
Robin Sharma
nodes.q: Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.

nodes.h:
“To get angry is like to revenge yourself for the guilt of others.” —
Jonathan Swift
nodes.q: To get angry is like to revenge yourself for the guilt of others.
